title: I could listen to these for HOURS - Soundcore Space A40 and Q45
description: Thanks to Soundcore for sponsoring this unboxing on the Space A40 and Space Q45s! You can learn more about them at the links below.  Learn More about Space Q45:  Learn More about Space A40:   Soundcore sent over their latest offerings in their Space lineup for Adam to unbox. Coming in at a very competitive price point with a slew of features, how do these headphones stack up?  Save on Amazon using our discount codes below:  Save 20% on Space Q45: US: GETSPACEUS UK: GETSPACEUK DE: GETSPACEDE CA: GETSPACECA  Save 20% on Space A40: US: FORSPACEUS UK: FORSPACEUK DE: FORSPACEDE CA: FORSPACECA  Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:25 Space A40 Unboxing 1:52 SURPRISE 2:46 Fit test and first listen 3:50 The Double Layer Diaphragm Drivers 4:20 LDAC and Noise Cancellation 5:05 The big boys: Space Q45 Unboxing 7:05 Checking out the headphones 8:45 Bluetooth 5.3 9:32 Lets listen to some tunes 10:55 Noise cancelling test 12:09 Mic test 12:56 Conclusion
